high_descs: Walk forward to the door then turn right and walk to the brown table.
Pick up the alarm clock that's in front of you.
Adjust yourself so you can turn on the light that's on the table in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a clock by lamp light.

high_descs: Walk forward to the door and turn right towards the alarm clock on the night stand.
Pick up the alarm clock from the night stand.
Walk around to the front of the night stand and stand in front of the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a lamp on a night stand.

high_descs: turn right to face the dresser
pick up the clock that is on the dresser
turn right, take a step, turn left, take a step, turn left to face the lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: examine a clock with a lamp
